member.name: SHARDAPPIDINFOIDLIST
member.summary: Contains data used by to identify both an item—in this case by an absolute pointer to an item identifier list (PIDL)—and the process that it is associated with.

member.name: SHARDAPPIDINFOIDLIST.pidl
member.summary: An absolute PIDL that gives the full path of the item in the Shell namespace.

member.name: SHARDAPPIDINFOIDLIST.pszAppID
member.summary: The application-defined AppUserModelID associated with the item.
